Last week I joined my @housebudgetGOP colleagues on the southern border to hear from our border agents & see the crisis firsthand. I joined @DanNewsManBall on @OANN to discuss just how bad the #BidenBorderCrisis has become.

78 years ago today more than 150,000 Allied troops began landing on the beaches of Normandy. The bravery of these soldiers led to the liberation of France from Nazi control & the Allied victory. #DDay78 https://t.co/SKgYcC2t9Q

It was great meeting with Franklin Township Trustee Jim Leezer and Administrator Steve Mazer today. I always enjoy discussing local issues and learning more about the communities I serve in #OH15 https://t.co/wK4U4uC7zU

State and federal law enforcement are battling the border crisis from many angles. Tonight my @housebudgetGOP colleagues and I were able to take a boat tour on the Rio Grande to see how the cartels are smuggling people and drugs into our communities. https://t.co/LqfAXqTW4E

We have record amounts of drugs and illegal immigrants flowing into our country, yet today I saw $350 million worth of border wall material sitting in a lot since the Biden Administration canceled contracts to build the wall. https://t.co/7xj9WIUOaU
I had the opportunity to thank our border agents at the wall. We must do all we can to support them, not cut funding as the Biden Administration has proposed. https://t.co/hA2yIDsQsk

I just left a Central Processing Center in McAllen, TX where border patrol agents are processing 10,000 migrants per week. As you can see, when agents are busy processing, there is not much preventing people from coming across the border.

This is the #BidenBorderCrisis https://t.co/B2GaGRyzXM
